## About me
I am a PhD student in statistics.
My subject is **Multisite stochastic generation of multivariate weather time series**. 

I am a part of the R38 team at EDF, as well as in [MIA-PS](https://mia-ps.inrae.fr/) team at [INRAE](https://www.inrae.fr/en), both located in Palaiseau.
